title: macOS Automatic Text Corrections (.GlobalPreferences)
description: Preference settings for system-wide automatic text replacements: Correct spelling automatically, Capitalize words automatically, Add period with double-space, Touch Bar typing suggestions and Use smart quotes and dashes. Corresponds to System Preferences > Keyboard > Text tab.

NSAutomaticDashSubstitutionEnabled.title: Automatic Dash Substitution
NSAutomaticDashSubstitutionEnabled.description: Use smart dashes. Replace double-dashes with emdash.

NSAutomaticQuoteSubstitutionEnabled.title: Automatic Quote Substitution
NSAutomaticQuoteSubstitutionEnabled.description: Use smart quotes. Replace straight quotes with curly quotes.

NSAutomaticTextCompletionEnabled.title: Automatic Text Completion
NSAutomaticTextCompletionEnabled.description: Suggest corrections and replace text automatically.
